name: Don't Pee Your Pants
description:
Possess a guy that is looking for the proper bathroom. Lots of people want to tell you which one is correct. 

Warnings for transphobic language and minor eye-burning.

I'd appreciate it if you talk to everyone until they repeat things but it's up to you. 

This is a bit of a venting thing I've been thinking about for a long time, having to deal with anxiety about the public bathroom since forever and realizing I was a guy definitely didn't help things out as I got older. 

This might be a bummer, be ready to find something to cheer you up if you play this.
